page.title: 09WISBECH ST. MARY PLAYGROUP
page.content: WISBECH ST. MARY PLAYGROUP. The playgroup was formed in l982, prior to this there were no facilities for the under-fives in Wisbech St. Mary. The group is run by a committee and there is a leader and two helpers to take care of the children during the morning sessions. The pavillion in the playing field is hired, for a nominal fee, to hold our morning meetings. These take place on a Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 9.l5a.m.-11.45a.m. Children are accepted from the age of three years and we can take up to twelve children each morning. The group is funded by fees charged and various fund raising events which are organised by the committee.
